rebindNumberKeys.name: Rebind number keys
rebindNumberKeys.hint: Overrides the default number key assignment when hovering a status marker to set the amount of stacks.

rebindMouseButtons.name: Rebind mouse buttons
rebindMouseButtons.hint: Overrides the default mouse button behavior to increase the stack count with left click and decrease it with right click. The status overlay can be set with Shift + Left click. A specific stack amount can be set with Alt + Left click.

multiSelect.name: Modify all selected tokens
multiSelect.hint: Adjusts effects and counters for all selected tokens.

stackInput.title: Enter new value
stackInput.content: Enter the new amount of stacks for status {status}:

displayOne.name: Display '1'
displayOne.hint: Configures when/if the counter should be displayed for a single stack.

counterFontSize.name: Counter font size
counterFontSize.hint: The font size of the status counter.

counterColor.name: Counter color
counterColor.hint: The color of the status counter in RRGGBB format.

countdownColor.name: Countdown color
countdownColor.hint: The color of combat countdowns in RRGGBB format.

defaultType.name: Default type
defaultType.hint: The default counter type if the effect has no configured type.
